title: Delete entitlement
content:
This page explains how to delete an entitlement record..

Prerequisite

If the entitlement is in the "In use" or "Deactivating" phase, change it to the "Inactive" phase before deleting it. For the procedure to change the phase of a product instance, see the "Change phase of entitlement" section in Entitlement workflow.

Delete entitlement

  1. Click > Plan > Company.
  2. In the Companies dropdown, click Entitlements.
  3. Select the entitlement you want to delete.
  4. Click Delete.
  5. Click OK in the Confirm Delete dialog box.
